card.name: export
card.content:
[[facebook meta]]
[[facebook meta+*right+*structure]]
[[Metric+facebook meta description+*type plus right+*structure]]
[[Article+facebook meta description+*type plus right+*structure]]
[[User+facebook meta description+*type plus right+*structure]]
[[Topic+facebook meta description+*type plus right+*structure]]
[[Company+facebook meta description+*type plus right+*structure]]
[[Company+facebook meta image+*type plus right+*structure]]
[[Topic+facebook meta image+*type plus right+*structure]]
[[User+facebook meta image+*type plus right+*structure]]
[[Article+facebook meta image+*type plus right+*structure]]
[[Metric+facebook meta image+*type plus right+*structure]]
[[Metric+facebook meta title+*type plus right+*structure]]
[[User+facebook meta type+*type plus right+*structure]]
[[Article+facebook meta type+*type plus right+*structure]]
[[facebook meta image+*right+*structure]]
[[facebook meta title+*right+*structure]]
[[facebook meta description+*right+*structure]]
[[facebook meta type+*right+*structure]]
[[home+facebook_meta_description]]
[[home+facebook_meta_description+*self+*structure]]

value.name: facebook meta+*right+*structure
value.content:
<meta property="og:site_name"          content="WikiRate.org" />
  <meta property="og:url"                content="http://6e43cd94.ngrok.com/{{_l|linkname}}" />
  <meta property="og:type"               content="{{_l+facebook_meta_type|core}}" />
  <meta property="og:title"              content="{{_l+facebook_meta_title|core}}" />
  <meta property="og:description"        content="{{_l+facebook_meta_description|core}}" />
  <meta property="og:image"              content="http://wikirate.org{{_l+facebook_meta_image|core}}" />
